it.polimi.checker

Class Checker

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.action.CHIAAction<SatisfactionValue>
      • it.polimi.checker.Checker

  • public class Checker
extends CHIAAction<SatisfactionValue>
    Contains the model checker used by the CHIA checker which checks whether the property is satisfied, possibly satisfied or not satisfied
    Author:
    Claudio Menghi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      creates a new Checker

      returns one of the counterexamples that makes the property violated

      returns the size of the automata generated during the model checking procedure

    • Constructor Detail

      • Checker

        public Checker(IBA model,
       BA claim,
       AcceptingPolicy acceptingPolicy)
        creates a new Checker
        Parameters:
        model - is the model to be analyzed by the model checker
        claim - is the specification to be considered by the model checker
        acceptingPolicy - specifies the acceptingPolicy to be used in the intersection procedure
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the model, the specification or the model checking parameters are null

    • Method Detail

      • perform

        public SatisfactionValue perform()
        checks if the model against is specification
        Specified by:
        perform in class CHIAAction<SatisfactionValue>
        Parameters:
        returnConstraint - contains the computed constraints (if any) after the verification procedure
        Returns:
        0 if the property is not satisfied, 1 if the property is satisfied, -1 if the property is satisfied with constraints.
